issue.title: [C++] ARROW_DATASET should enable ARROW_COMPUTE
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7783](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7783). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currenty, passing `-DARROW_DATASET=ON` to CMake doesn't enable ARROW_COMPUTE, which leads to linker errors.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7783?focusedCommentId=17031668) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
You might want to toggle PARQUET too.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7783?focusedCommentId=17031672) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Parquet should be optional for dataset, no?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7783?focusedCommentId=17031731) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Yes, it should be optional

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7783?focusedCommentId=17069123) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6745
